original_text: So he went back to Judah and said, “I didn’t find her. Besides, the men who lived there said, ‘There hasn’t been any shrine prostitute here.’”
korean_text: 그가 유다에게로 돌아와 이르되 내가 그를 찾지 못하였고 그 곳 사람도 이르기를 거기에는 창녀가 없다 하더이다 하더라

sentences.original_text: So he went back to Judah
Besides, the men who lived there said
There hasn't been any shrine prostitute here.
